Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line trains bypassing Oak Park Station
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at Oak Park station due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at Oak Park station due to a police investigation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #20 Madison buses

Also, as a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available from Harlem/Lake to Ridgeland to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
